segments.text: Observing this scene, the kitchen details are sharp.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman faces left, towel in hand on the plate.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Suddenly, I realize the faucet's been left on!
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Water's pouring over, unseen by her.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The puddle grows, her shoe submerged.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: To the side, dishes stacked high.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The window frames a surprising peaceful garden.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Bushes neatly trimmed, path winding back.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: But inside, the boy's on the stool unexpectedly high.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Reaching into the cookie jar boldly.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The stool tips slightly, that's startling.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl reaches up, joining the surprise mischief.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's all so unexpectedly chaotic yet calm.
segments.speaker: PAR
